Get In Touch My Work

About Me

I am based in Vancouver and currently attending the University of British Columbia as a second year computer science student.


Skilled and experienced in full stack development, through both personal endevaours and through UBC Launch Pad, where I hold the position of Software Developer. My curiosity and skillset continue to expand as I look for other avenues where I can have an impact through code.


Beyond code, I spend my time reading, cooking, working out and trading on the stock market.
